channel.title: 317 Tutorial's 1/2
channel.description:
[font=comic sans ms][size=24pt]317 Basic Learning[/size][/font] [hr]
Credit- Dragonkk(me) %100
This tutorial is by [u]Me[/u] Dragonk.
Ever need help coding a 317? Your a new-commer well try *317* first, before you do (562,508,525,614) Ill teach you some 317 simple coding's.
1. Go pick out a source and client, Having trouble try out mine it's simple http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,469565.0.html , Trouble Downloading?
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2hzjwiw.png[/img]
2. Simply Open up the source, If you have noo idea at all how to look at this Image bellow
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2ele0br.png[/img]
3. After Search "Client.java" in the search bar or scroll down and find It.
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/w8rm6d.png[/img]
4. Search "Welcome to" and enter your message.
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2r5rebt.png[/img]
[hr]
[b]Ok so that was a basic stuff, you only edited "Starting" Message, So that's preety much simplest.[/b] [b]Ok now as you know, At "home" of the server there is Mage-Over-Mage Saying welcome to haxscape and you wanna edit that to say your message, dont you right? Well, this is how to do it.[/b]
1. Open the source like you did before, and this time [u]Search[/u] [u]Npchandler.java[/u]
2. [b]After open it up, If your new to coding .java or c+ anything like that and your wondering why is .java a notepad? Well that's the way of it, It's not pose to be a program.[/b]
3. [i]Now that you opened it up, Search for [/i] [u]"Welcome to haxscape"[/u] [i]If nothing come's up just search[/i] [u]"Welcome to"[/u]
4. Edit the message you want it, to say.
5. If you want another npc to say it Copy this code below and add it under the mage-over one.
[code=actionscript] if (npcs[i].npcType == 599) { //npc id, the npc that says it. if (misc.random2(50) <= 3) //Time between saying your text. { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to HaxScape"; //change that to what you want. } } [/code]
[hr]
[b]Ok Now It's time to code shop's, You think the shop's are gay and you wanna make the server pk server and your changing shop's and shit, Here's how to do it.[/b]
1. Open [u]Source[/u] and [u]Search[/u] [b]Shop.cfg[/b]
2. Open it up and You'll see alot of stuff like [code=actionscript3]shop = 4 Pk_Shop_1 2 2 542 500 544 500 1725 500 3105 500 7458 500 7459 500 7460 500 4369 500 4405 500 3751 500 3755 500 3753 500 3385 500 3387 500 3389 500 3391 500 3393 500 5574 500 5575 500 5576 500 6107 500 6108 500 6109 500 5698 100 4151 100 1434 100 1305 100 4587 100 3842 500 4153 100 746 100 6585 10 6737 100 6731 100 6735 100 3140 100 7611 100 4087 100 4585 100 1837 1000[/code]
There will be 42 shop's in all.
3. Now that you wanna add it It's gonna be something like this shop = 1 Pk_Shop_1 (ID OF ITEM) (AMMOUNT OF ITEM)
4. When you add the item im sure 90% of you are gonna get erro's cause when your adding item's dont add with "SPACE" do [size=18pt]TAB[/size] or else you'll get alot of erro's like 100, Or so.
[b]Thank you, for viewing this was a long topic but it's worth helping you guy's.[/b] [b]Please check out my website and talk to me 4 more and more help[/b]
Contact Information- [b]Website: http://ultimaterspshelp.webs.com/[/b] [b]Window Live Messanger: arthurdude@Live.com[/b]
Warning: Please, dont annoy me or ill have to block you. Thank's

item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

Your tutorial explains to players how to change a servers name, to me this seems like a tutorial on how to leech 101. But even though we have a bunch of these and the mods keep locking them, keep adding to it.

Im sure itll be a bit different from all the other ones

Don’t forget to include:
"But you might as well not waste your time if you are going to leech a server and not even try to come up with something of your own. Because you will be 1 of 900 leeched servers that are online and available to the public. But if you think you are special enough. And believe in Tinkerbell hard enough. Maybe your dreams might come true…

item.title: 317 Tutorial's 1/2
item.dc:creator: @DragonK DragonK
item.description:
@DragonK wrote:

[font=comic sans ms][size=24pt]317 Basic Learning[/size][/font]
[hr]

Credit-
Dragonkk(me) %100

This tutorial is by Me Dragonk.

Ever need help coding a 317? Your a new-commer well try 317 first, before you do (562,508,525,614) Ill teach you some 317 simple coding’s.

  1. Go pick out a source and client, Having trouble try out mine it’s simple http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,469565.0.html , Trouble Downloading?

  1. Simply Open up the source, If you have noo idea at all how to look at this Image bellow

2ele0br.png944×399

  1. After Search “Client.java” in the search bar or scroll down and find It.

w8rm6d.png717×324

  1. Search “Welcome to” and enter your message.

[hr]

Ok so that was a basic stuff, you only edited “Starting” Message, So that’s preety much simplest.
Ok now as you know, At “home” of the server there is Mage-Over-Mage Saying welcome to haxscape and you wanna edit that to say your message, dont you right? Well, this is how to do it.

  1. Open the source like you did before, and this time Search Npchandler.java

  2. After open it up, If your new to coding .java or c+ anything like that and your wondering why is .java a notepad? Well that’s the way of it, It’s not pose to be a program.

  3. Now that you opened it up, Search for “Welcome to haxscape” If nothing come’s up just search “Welcome to”

  4. Edit the message you want it, to say.

  5. If you want another npc to say it Copy this code below and add it under the mage-over one.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 599) { //npc id, the npc that says it. if (misc.random2(50) <= 3) //Time between saying your text. { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to HaxScape"; //change that to what you want. } }

[hr]

Ok Now It’s time to code shop’s, You think the shop’s are gay and you wanna make the server pk server and your changing shop’s and shit, Here’s how to do it.

  1. Open Source and Search Shop.cfg

  2. Open it up and You’ll see alot of stuff like

shop = 4	Pk_Shop_1					2	2	542	500	544	500	1725	500	3105	500	7458	500	7459	500	7460	500	4369	500	4405	500	3751	500	3755	500	3753	500	3385	500	3387	500	3389	500	3391	500	3393	500	5574	500	5575	500	5576	500	6107	500	6108	500	6109	500	5698	100	4151	100	1434	100	1305	100	4587	100	3842	500	4153	100	746	100	6585	10	6737	100	6731	100	6735	100	3140	100	7611	100	4087	100	4585	100	1837	1000

There will be 42 shop’s in all.

  1. Now that you wanna add it It’s gonna be something like this shop = 1 Pk_Shop_1 (ID OF ITEM) (AMMOUNT OF ITEM)

  2. When you add the item im sure 90% of you are gonna get erro’s cause when your adding item’s dont add
    with “SPACE” do [size=18pt]TAB[/size] or else you’ll get alot of erro’s like 100, Or so.

Thank you, for viewing this was a long topic but it’s worth helping you guy’s.
Please check out my website and talk to me 4 more and more help

Contact Information-
Website: http://ultimaterspshelp.webs.com/
Window Live Messanger: arthurdude@Live.com

Warning: Please, dont annoy me or ill have to block you.
Thank’s
